name: Gloomhaven
description: A massive cooperative campaign game of tactical combat and evolving storylines. Players manage unique characters, explore dungeons, and unlock new content over time.

name: Deliverance
description: A Christian-themed fantasy dungeon crawler with angels battling demons. Combines cooperative tactics with faith-driven storytelling.

name: Codenames Duet
description: A cooperative word association game where players work together to find agents. Avoid the assassin while uncovering all correct words.

name: Villainous
description: Play as a Disney villain competing to achieve your unique objective. Use strategy, fate cards, and villainous powers to outwit opponents.

name: Skyjo
description: A light card game about minimizing your score by swapping and revealing cards. Quick turns and simple rules make it highly accessible.

name: Keyforge
description: Each deck is unique and cannot be altered, offering one-of-a-kind battles. Players use three houses of cards to forge keys before their rival.

name: Fox in the Forest
description: A two-player trick-taking game with fairy tale powers. Balance winning and losing tricks to score most efficiently.

name: Fox in the Forest Duet
description: A cooperative trick-taking game for two players. Work together to move along the forest path and collect gems.

name: Cat In The Box
description: A quantum trick-taking game where colors aren’t defined until played. Players manipulate paradoxes and shared knowledge to win.

name: Sushi Go Party
description: Draft sushi dishes to score the best combinations. Expanded party version adds variety and supports larger groups.

name: Control
description: A quick hand management game with time travel theming. Players race to reach a set score by manipulating fuel and sabotage cards.

name: One Night Ultimate Werewolf
description: A hidden role game of deduction and bluffing. Each game lasts just one night and one day, making it fast and replayable.

name: Killer Bunnies
description: A chaotic card game of quirky humor and survival. Players compete to keep their bunnies alive while collecting carrots.

name: Cahoots
description: A cooperative game where players secretly work together. Match numbers or colors to complete shared goals without table talk.

name: Hanabi
description: Players hold cards facing outward and give limited clues. Work together to play fireworks in the correct order before time runs out.

name: Railroad Ink
description: Draw roads and railways to connect exits on your board. Dice rolls dictate available routes each round.

name: Coup
description: A fast game of bluff, deduction, and influence. Manipulate roles to eliminate rivals and be the last one standing.

name: The Crew
description: A cooperative trick-taking game with missions. Players must fulfill unique objectives through coordinated card play.

name: The Crew: Mission Deep Sea
description: A standalone sequel with more variety in missions. Players cooperate to complete challenging objectives in underwater exploration.

name: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring Trick-Taking Game
description: A cooperative trick-taking game set in Middle-earth. Work together to balance burdens and ensure the Fellowship’s survival.

name: One Deck Dungeon
description: A cooperative dungeon crawl played with dice and cards. Players fight monsters and gain loot to survive deeper levels.

name: How to Rob a Bank
description: A programmed movement game of robbers versus guards. Plan actions secretly and try to escape with the loot.

name: Bang! The Dice Game
description: Fast-paced Wild West shootouts using dice rolls. Secret roles and quick rounds keep tension high.

name: Almost Innocent
description: A cooperative deduction game of solving crimes together. Each player knows clues about others but not their own.

name: Gizmos
description: Build wacky contraptions by chaining marble-powered effects. Manage resources and upgrades to create the best machine.

name: Captain Sonar
description: Two submarine crews face off in real-time or turn-based combat. Coordinate roles to track, maneuver, and sink the enemy.

name: Potion Explosion
description: Pick marbles from a dispenser to complete potions. Chain reactions create combos for powerful effects.

name: Threads of Fate
description: A cooperative time-travel adventure with branching stories. Players unravel mysteries by making impactful choices.

name: Wombat Kombat
description: Battle wombats in chaotic card combat. Play abilities and tricks to outlast rivals in silly showdowns.

name: Fire Tower
description: Spread flames and block opponents with wind cards. Protect your own fire tower while burning down others.

name: Space Base
description: Roll dice to activate ships in your fleet. Gain resources and chain upgrades to expand your galactic economy.

name: Dominion
description: A deck-building card game where players compete to build the most efficient and powerful deck of cards. Expand your options each turn with purchased cards.

name: War Chest
description: A tactical bag-building game of medieval warfare. Deploy units and control key points with asymmetric powers.

name: Mysterium
description: One player is a ghost giving visions while others interpret clues. Work together to solve the murder before time runs out.

name: The Search for Planet X
description: Use logic and astronomy to locate a hidden planet. A companion app drives the puzzle while players race to conclusions.

name: Turing Machine
description: A competitive code-breaking game using logic tests. Use mechanical punch cards to deduce the hidden code efficiently.

name: Scotland Yard
description: Detectives chase the elusive Mr. X across London. Work together to coordinate movement and capture the fugitive.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse
description: Superheroes team up to battle villains in this card-based brawl. Each hero deck offers unique powers and combos.

name: Mists over Carcassonne
description: A cooperative twist on Carcassonne with ghostly challenges. Players must work together to contain the mist and score points.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
description: A cooperative card game set in Tolkien’s world. Players form fellowships to tackle scenarios with heroes and allies.

name: Concordia Venus
description: A standalone expansion of Concordia with team play. Build trade networks and expand influence across the Roman Empire.

name: Wingspan
description: Collect and play bird cards with unique powers. Build habitats, lay eggs, and gain food in a relaxing strategy game.

name: Gaia Project
description: A deep sci-fi reimplementation of Terra Mystica. Expand factions, terraform planets, and advance technologies for points.

name: Tiny Towns
description: Use resources to construct buildings on a limited grid. Clever placement creates a prosperous and efficient town.

name: Heat: Pedal to the Metal
description: A hand management racing game simulating high-speed competition. Manage gears and heat to outpace rivals on the track.

name: Cubitos
description: Race quirky cube runners by rolling custom dice. Push your luck for speed or risk busting out.

name: The Captain is Dead: Dangerous Planet
description: Players explore a hostile alien planet after their ship crashes. Work together to survive waves of alien threats.

name: Codex Card Time Strategy
description: A customizable real-time strategy game in card form. Build your codex, summon units, and defeat the enemy base.

name: Mage Wars Arena
description: Players act as mages dueling with customizable spellbooks. Cast spells, summon creatures, and control the arena.

name: Summoner Wars
description: A dueling game of summoners commanding armies. Play cards to summon units and destroy the enemy summoner.

name: Dice Throne
description: Players battle using unique heroes with custom dice and abilities. Upgrade cards and manipulate rolls to defeat opponents.

name: Mage Noir
description: A dueling game where mages channel elemental magic. Build chains of spells and manage resources to outwit rivals.

name: Race for the Galaxy
description: Players build galactic civilizations using cards for worlds and technologies. Simultaneous role selection keeps play fast and strategic.

name: Mage Knight
description: A deep solo or cooperative adventure with deck building and exploration. Control powerful heroes to conquer cities and enemies.

name: Too Many Bones
description: A cooperative dice-building adventure with unique Gearlocs. Battle through encounters using tactical dice-driven combat.

name: Mystic Vale
description: A deck-building game with card crafting mechanics. Enhance transparent cards to improve your deck over time.

name: Thunderstone Quest
description: A fantasy deck-building game with dungeon crawling elements. Recruit heroes, acquire weapons, and defeat monsters.

name: Uprising
description: A cooperative 4X game set in a dark fantasy world. Players fight against two AI empires while trying to survive.

name: Slay the Spire
description: A roguelike deck builder where players ascend a spire of enemies. Combine cards and relics for powerful synergies.

name: Unstoppable
description: A fast-paced battle of timing and combos. Players chain abilities to overwhelm rivals in quick rounds.

name: Mosaic: A Story of Civilization
description: A civilization-building game of cards and tiles. Expand cities, technologies, and armies to shape your empire’s story.

name: Edge of Darkness
description: A complex deck-building game with card crafting. Players defend the city while competing for influence and power.

name: Eclipse: Second Dawn for the Galaxy
description: A massive 4X sci-fi strategy game of exploration, combat, and tech. Balance diplomacy, fleets, and expansion to dominate the galaxy.

name: Aeon's End
description: Players are mages defending the last bastion of humanity. Use unique decks without shuffling to battle relentless Nemesies.

name: Spirit Island
description: Players are powerful spirits protecting an island from colonizers. Combine unique powers and coordinate to repel invaders.
